name: Better Gauntlets
description: Bring the Gauntlets to life with new visuals!

islands-float.name: Islands Hover
islands-float.description: Gauntlet Islands will have a <cg>floating/hovering animation</c>.

rescale-refresh-spr.name: Re-scale Loading Circle
rescale-refresh-spr.description: Re-scales the loading circle visible when loading Gauntlet Levels. <cg>Use the arrows for better accuracy</c>!

enable-background-particles.name: Background Particles
enable-background-particles.description: Enables the background particles added by <cc>Better Gauntlets</c>.

toggle-paths.name: Enable Gauntlet Paths
toggle-paths.description: Toggles the paths in between Gauntlet Levels.

path-opacity.name: Path Opacity
path-opacity.description: Sets the opacity of the path dots in between the Gauntlet Levels.

vault-tooltip.name: Toggle Vault Tooltip
vault-tooltip.description:
Toggles the tooltip for the Gauntlet's Vault Levels.

Must have <cg>Gauntlet Level Vault</c> by <cy>Jacob375</c> installed.
